# Instant Pot Refried Beans

Refried beans, but in an instant pot.

Some longer description of the recipe, that is more verbose than just a meta-tag caliber string...

# Ingredients:

  • 1.5 cups Pinto beans (Or black beans)
  • Water

# Directions:

  1. Put [1½ cups] uncooked beans into Instant Pot.
  2. Add enough water to cover by 1-2".
  3. Cover Instant Pot w/ lid and cook for 40 minutes on High.
  4. After beans have finished cooking, allow to naturally vent for 10 minutes (and then quick release any remaining pressure).
  5. Strain.
  6. Mash beans using a wooden spoon or potato masher.
